titles.title: A resolution honoring the life and legacy of Lieutenant General Thomas P. Stafford.
A resolution honoring the life and legacy of Lieutenant General Thomas P. Stafford.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: This resolution honors the life and legacy of Lieutenant General Thomas P. Stafford for his contributions to the Armed Forces and space mission of the United States. Additionally, the resolution extends condolences to the family and friends of General Stafford.
